com.algodeal.marketrunner.strategies
Interface Portfolio

public interface Portfolio

Method Summary
 double getAmount(Tradeable instrument)
          Returns the amount of the position for the specified instrument, in the currency of that instrument.
 double getEntryAmount(Tradeable instrument)
          Returns the price paid to enter this position, including factor.
 Set<Tradeable> getInstruments()
          Returns the set of tradeable instruments tracked by the portfolio.
 double getLongExposition()
          Returns the total amount of all long positions of the portfolio, converted in USD.
 double getNav(Tradeable instrument)
          Returns the Net Asset Value of the portfolio for one instrument.
 Order[] getOrders()
          Returns the entire list of orders.
 Position getPosition(Tradeable instrument)
          Returns the position for the specified instrument.
 Map<Tradeable,Position> getPositions()
          Returns the positions for all instruments.
 double getShortExposition()
          Returns the total amount of all short positions of the portfolio, converted in USD.
 double getTotalNav()
          Returns the Net Asset Value of the portfolio for all instruments, converted in USD.
 boolean hasPosition()
          Returns true if the position is not flat, for any instrument.
 boolean hasPosition(Tradeable instrument)
          Returns true if the position is not flat, for a given instrument.
 

Method Detail

getOrders

Order[] getOrders()
Returns the entire list of orders. Those send to market first and then those pending.

Returns:
orders that have not been executed yet.

getPositions

Map<Tradeable,Position> getPositions()
Returns the positions for all instruments.

getInstruments

Set<Tradeable> getInstruments()
Returns the set of tradeable instruments tracked by the portfolio.

getPosition

Position getPosition(Tradeable instrument)
Returns the position for the specified instrument.

hasPosition

boolean hasPosition()
Returns true if the position is not flat, for any instrument.

hasPosition

boolean hasPosition(Tradeable instrument)
Returns true if the position is not flat, for a given instrument.

getAmount

double getAmount(Tradeable instrument)
Returns the amount of the position for the specified instrument, in the currency of that instrument.

See Also:
Position.getAmount()

getEntryAmount

double getEntryAmount(Tradeable instrument)
Returns the price paid to enter this position, including factor. Expressed in the currency of the instrument.

See Also:
Position.getEntryAmount()

getNav

double getNav(Tradeable instrument)
Returns the Net Asset Value of the portfolio for one instrument. It factors all previous PnL for all transactions. Opened positions are marked to market with the latest price information expressed in the currency of the instrument.

getTotalNav

double getTotalNav()
Returns the Net Asset Value of the portfolio for all instruments, converted in USD. Local runs use a fixed rate of 1.0 for all currencies. It factors all previous PnL for all transactions. Opened positions are marked to market with the latest price information expressed in the currency of the instrument.

getLongExposition

double getLongExposition()
Returns the total amount of all long positions of the portfolio, converted in USD. Local runs use a fixed rate of 1.0 for all currencies.

getShortExposition

double getShortExposition()
Returns the total amount of all short positions of the portfolio, converted in USD. Local runs use a fixed rate of 1.0 for all currencies.
